docs.snippet: Breaking months of public silence, former Baylor coach Art Briles said Thursday he could no longer "remain silent" and insisted he did not cover up sexual violence by his players or try to obstruct any investigations tied to the assault scandal at...

docs.snippet: Attorney General Jeff Sessions agreed Thursday to recuse himself from any investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election. The move came after revelations that Sessions twice spoke with the Russian ambassador during the c...
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions agreed Thursday to recuse himself from any investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election. The move came after revelations that Sessions twice spoke with the Russian ambassador during the campaign, a fact that seemingly contradicts sworn statements he made to Congress during his confirmation hearings.

headline.main: Questions and Answers About Perjury, Sessions' Statements
headline.print_headline: Questions and Answers About Perjury, Sessions' Statements
